content: This article may **require cleanup** to meet Wikipedia's quality standards. The specific problem is: **Table is far too wide and contains excessive information compared to other colonial administrator lists.** Please help improve this article if you can. *(August 2025)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* ## Resident councillors of Singapore (1826-1867) The **resident councillor of Singapore** was a high ranking government civil position in [colonial Singapore](/wiki/Colonial_Singapore) during the [Straits Settlements](/wiki/Straits_Settlements) era. It was second only to the [governor of the Straits Settlements](/wiki/List_of_governors_of_the_Straits_Settlements) in the colonial government. **No.**PortraitName (Born–Died)Term of officeBackground
